com.smartnsoft.droid4me.bo

Interface Business.OutputStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Business.Cacheable<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType,StreamerExceptionType,InputExceptionType>, Business.IOStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackedWSUriStreamParser.BackedUriStreamedMap, BackedWSUriStreamParser.BackedUriStreamedValue, Business.Cached, Business.ObjectCached, DbPersistence, FilePersistence, NullPersistence, Persistence, WithCacheWSUriStreamParser.CacheableWebUriStreamParser, WithCacheWSUriStreamParser.CachedWebUriStreamParser
    Enclosing class:
    Business

    public static interface Business.OutputStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable>
    Is able to write the input stream corresponding to a local business object, attached to a URI.
    Since:
    2009.08.31

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.InputStream writeInputStream(UriType uri, Business.InputAtom inputAtom, boolean returnStream)
      Is responsible for writing the provided data.

    • Method Detail

      • writeInputStream

        java.io.InputStream writeInputStream(UriType uri,
                                   Business.InputAtom inputAtom,
                                   boolean returnStream)
                                     throws ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable
        Is responsible for writing the provided data.

        The returnStream parameter enables to tune whether the implementation is supposed to return the provided input stream.

        Parameters:
        uri - the URI the data belongs to
        inputAtom - the wrapper that contains the data to be persisted the Business.InputAtom.inputStream is allowed to be null: in that case, a null-like object must be persisted
        returnStream - if set true, a valid InputStream corresponding to the provided Business.InputAtom.inputStream must be returned ; if set to false, null must be returned
        Returns:
        a valid input stream corresponding to the persisted data; it is not allowed to be null when the returnStream parameter is true. Otherwise, null must be returned
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any problem occurs while persisting the data
        ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable
